intro.text: I design and develop efficient, accessible, and easy-to-maintain websites. I combine creativity with solid technical solutions to help projects and businesses grow in the digital world.

list.title: Technical Consulting
items: I analyze and propose solutions for architecture, performance, and scalability in web projects.
I define coding standards and best practices to maintain quality and sustainability.
I participate in key technical decisions, ensuring clarity and efficiency in project structure.

list.title: Full-Stack Web Development
items: I build efficient, accessible, and scalable applications and websites.
Experience with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.
I work on backend (APIs, data) and frontend, integrating both and building reusable, maintainable code.

list.title: Maintenance
items: I manage updates, security, and performance to keep systems stable.
I implement improvements and refactorings focused on maintainability and project performance.
Clear documentation to ensure continuity and ease of maintenance.
